description: In partnership with AA International, weâ€™re utilizing our IP from the Bored Ape Yacht Club to bring you the original music track "Bored to Death" by THR33LL together with a 4444 unique collection of Angry Apes PFP with enhanced imagery at 4000 x 4000 pixels.
